body: we are posting a video on avicus  why cant we advertise it
body_tagged: we are posting a video on avicus  why cant we advertise it
title: hello paraspider

replies.body:
Hello to you, too.

You have a lot of posts already cluttering up with warnings and locks. The reasons I've locked them is well, in the posts I've made. You need to stop advertising your youtube channel in non relevant threads (I've archived them), stop making 6 different threads collectively on your channel, and follow the rules. Keep it relevant, use your thread, and there's no problem.
